POSTINFO.MAIL_INSTR: Mail sent by courier delivery should be sent to American Embassy, US Commercial Service, Lauro Muller 1776, Montevideo 11200, Uruguay. All mail sent by regular post or pouch should be sent to US Embassy Montevideo, Unit 4502, APO AA 34035
By APO Work Week: Sunday - Thursday
By APO
For expedited delivery - use courier addressed to our international address.
Please note that APO regulations require mail to be addressed to the American officer at post and not directly to the FSN staff.
Work Week: Sunday - Thursday
All mail to the UAE is delivered to post boxes only. There is as yet no street delivery.

Clients should note that correspondence sent to the U.S. mailing address takes about 15 days to reach Stockholm. Time-sensitive materials should be sent either by U.S. mail to the street address, or via courier or express delivery service.
Please note that shipments to the Washington, DC address will take approximately three weeks to arrive in South Africa.
For courier delivery, use the above street address; For pouch, use the above mailing address

All promotional materials for Gold Keys, missions, IPSs, shows, etc. should be sent to the street address using a courier service. Using regular mail or the P.O Box address will delay delivery. On mailing label, claim "no commercial value."
